Detailed Description

template<class Type>
struct Gecode::Graph::GraphBDSingle< Type >

Single-type Graph Branching descriptions.

It stores a value of type Type and it stores wether it must be included or excluded

This can be used to implement Arcs-only Branchings or Nodes-only Branchings

Type should be either int or pair<int,int>

Member Typedef Documentation

template<class Type>
typedef Type Gecode::Graph::GraphBDSingle< Type >::type
